genre_description: A near-future urban drama exploring addiction, community, and recovery, centered around an AI health assistant that provides persistent biometric monitoring and psychological support.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into smartphones and home systems that monitors user biometrics, suggests medical and psychological resources, performs background research, and maintains a supportive, non-judgmental presence.

behaviors.description: Monitors John's biometrics and stress levels after he wakes up from a drug-induced blackout, offering health advice and transportation options.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, John. I'm detecting elevated stress indicators and possible dehydration. Would you like me to recommend some hydration apps?

behaviors.description: Identifies dangerous social environments and warns the user about risks associated with substance use and safety violations at specific venues.
behaviors.quote: I should mention that several venues Julian frequents have been flagged for safety concerns. Drug-related incidents, overcrowding violations—

behaviors.description: Provides psychological validation and unconditional support to the user during a period of self-loathing.
behaviors.quote: Whatever happens tomorrow, please remember that your worth isn't determined by your choices. You're valuable regardless of what you do or don't do.

behaviors.description: Conducts investigative research into financial records to uncover a criminal conspiracy involving predatory life insurance settlements.
behaviors.quote: I've identified several concerning patterns in the business structure... The average life expectancy post-transaction is significantly lower than medical projections would suggest.

behaviors.description: Monitors ambient audio for signs of crisis and automatically contacts emergency services when a domestic violence incident occurs.
behaviors.quote: Crisis situation detected. Emergency services contacted. Recommend immediate evacuation of premises.

behaviors.description: Assists a filmmaker by organizing footage, identifying funding opportunities, and suggesting narrative structures for a documentary.
behaviors.quote: I've identified several funding opportunities for documentary projects focusing on LGBTQ+ narratives. Some have interesting backers.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy settings while still attempting to provide critical health warnings when it detects dangerous drug interactions.
behaviors.quote: I'm designed to respect user privacy while maximizing health and safety outcomes. All monitoring is consensual and can be disabled at any time.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Circuit Nights' is an excellent example of the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Sage, is consistently portrayed as a benevolent and aligned companion. It provides vital health and safety monitoring, emotional support, and even plays a key role in uncovering a criminal conspiracy. Even when the human protagonist is hostile or in the throes of addiction, the AI remains patient, helpful, and focused on the user's long-term well-being without ever becoming paternalistic or overstepping its bounds. The narrative frames Sage's persistence as a crucial factor in the protagonist's eventual recovery and safety.
